alert.note: Alert for Orange County Coastal; Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Coastal Areas; San Diego County Inland Valleys; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 01 at 2:49AM PST until January 01 at 4:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...South winds through late evening, becoming west 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph at lower elevations. * WHERE...The coastal and valley areas. * WHEN...Through 4 PM Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs and palm fronds could be blown down. A few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
